bio: BlockBeats editor（News and one of the sharpest Chinese observers on Crypto, Web3.0 industry）
contributionDescription: As a media editor, I helped Optimism get 100,000-level exposure and dynamic follow-up.I joined BlockBeats (News and One of the Sharp Chinese Observers on Crypto, Web 3.0 Industry.) for two years, and I have published more than 80 news bulletins on Optimism projects and ecology, helping Optimism to build awareness in Chinese areas and keep abreast of project trends.
impactDescription: As an editor, I joined BlockBeats (News and One of the Sharp Chinese Observers on Crypto, Web 3.0 Industry.) for two years, and I have published more than 80 news bulletins on Optimism projects and ecology, helping Optimism to build awareness in Chinese areas and keep abreast of project trends.
